name: Fishin' for Friends
description:
Ahoy there, land lover!
Jeb here to guide you along your fishing adventure! 
Grab your fishing rod and get ready to collect some new friends!
Can I interest you in fishing around the famous Jeb lake.
Perhaps you may find more then you are looking for!

installation guide:PLEASE NOTE! you may need all the VC redistributables installed on your pc

( VC2010, VC2012, VC2013, and VC2015 )

All assets /SFX and game play was made by WhiteVault

Game theme was created my AppleFritters4LittleCritters 

A big thanks to VimLark for hosting this awesome Game Jam!

And thank  you  for joining me as I built this game on stream and I hope you enjoy playing it!
